virtual void RTRManagedVariable::addClient (  RTRManagedVariableClient &  newClient  )  [virtual, inherited]
 

Register the given client to receive events from this variable.
ENSURE : hasClient(newClient)

virtual void RTRManagedVariable::dropClient (  RTRManagedVariableClient &  oldClient  )  [virtual, inherited]
 

Un-register the given client to receive events from this variable.
ENSURE : !hasClient(oldClient)

RTRBOOL RTRManagedVariable::hasClient (  RTRManagedVariableClient &  client  )  const [inherited]
 

Is the given client registered to receive events from this variable.

RTRBOOL RTRManagedVariable::hasClients (   )  const [inline, inherited]
 

Does this variable have any clients.
